column2: "Well, you seem to be sticking at it, hm? I've been hearing about your exploits all over."
"So, why don't you show me some of that skill?"
"How about a Time Attack? You know, a race against the clock to set a good time."
"Clear this test with full marks as fast as you can. Don't worry about the difficulty."
"Set a record, claim your prize. What have you got to lose?"
